tool_description: Creates smooth trajectories from discrete waypoints by applying spline interpolation and temporal parameterization.

waypoints.description: Input waypoints as flattened joint angles

time_points.description: Time stamps for each waypoint in seconds

spline_order.description: Spline polynomial order (3 for cubic, 5 for quintic)

boundary_conditions.description: Boundary condition type: zero_velocity, natural, clamped

max_velocity.description: Maximum velocity for each joint in rad/s

max_acceleration.description: Maximum acceleration for each joint in rad/sÂ²

error_messages: Invalid waypoint format: Number of waypoint values must be divisible by num_joints.
Insufficient waypoints: At least 2 waypoints required for interpolation.
Time point mismatch: If provided, time_points array must match number of waypoints.
Invalid spline order: spline_order must be 3 or 5.
Invalid frequency: output_frequency must be between 10 and 1000 Hz.
Constraint violation: max_velocity and max_acceleration arrays must match num_joints if provided.
usage: Provide waypoints as flattened joint angles, num_joints, and optional timing/constraint parameters. Returns smooth interpolated trajectory.

trajectory.description: Interpolated trajectory as flattened joint positions

time_stamps.description: Time stamps for each trajectory point

num_points.description: Number of points in output trajectory
